content: wings in white or metallic yarn bun in hair colour and hair straight stitches the same hands could be sewn in a praying position with a couple of stitches to hold the elbow bend a gold pipecleaner loop would work to make a halo if you make an angel i would love to see them on ravelry project pages enjoy copyright 2014 please do not reproduce or sell pattern selling the finished toy is ok but please give credit where it is due
